task_flows.flow_name: Access and Configure Daily Wage Calculator
steps: Select calculation type from dropdown (calendar days, working days, or custom days)
Choose salary components to include in calculation
Verify system applies calculation based on selected parameters

task_flows.flow_name: Configure End of Service Leave Encashment
steps: Choose salary components (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)
Select calculation method (Calendar Days, Working Days, or Custom Days)
Configure specific leave types for end-of-service calculations
Select day calculation type (calendar days, working days, or custom days)
Choose calculation basis (custom days, calendar days, or working days)
If payroll month is open, reject existing prorated transactions
Confirm new proration settings are applied

task_flows.flow_name: Process Unpaid Leave with Daily Wage Calculation
steps: Receive unpaid leave request from employee
System determines applicable leave policy (calendar or working days)
System calculates total working days for leave period
System subtracts public holidays from working days
System calculates daily pay rate using configured daily wage calculator
System generates payroll deduction based on calculated daily rate

duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Test Daily Wage Calculator configuration interface: verify calculation basis dropdown displays options (calendar days, working days, custom days), confirm salary components selection UI is functional, validate that formula override visual indicators (greyed-out fields) clearly communicate when payroll settings override leave policy configurations

Verify that unpaid leave deduction remarks and daily rate displays use correct temporal context: display correct number of days for the specific month (accounting for leap years) and show daily rate from leave occurrence month rather than payroll processing month
